column4: I'm going to install Breezy from the CD on a computer with no interenet access. I need python-wxgtk2.6 but how do I determine what other dependencies I have to download and take with me?
look the package up on packages.ubuntu.com and it should tell you the depends
But no quick way to find out dependencies recursively and exclude those already present on the cd?
not as far as I know - not thru that website, anyway
